short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chat extension that encourages niceness.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever sent a message you wish you hadn't? Or wished someone had thought before they sent a text? With Nicerly, you'll be notified when you are about to send potentially hurtful messages on Messenger.
